contest-event.event-date:
April 9, 1972 D NWABBA Contest (Championship Section)
NWABBA Contest (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest nwabba-championship-section
Own Choice from a Specified List
Pembroke Halls, Worsley, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £25 and rose bowl, 3rd £15 and trophy. Best horn - Tyldesley. Best cornet, euphonium and trombone - Hoggarths. Choice of Prometheus Unbound or Concert Overture (Tausky) 3 bands competed.
May 21, 2015, 10:09 a.m. May 18, 2016, 9:29 a.m.
1 Warburtons Bakery Band Harry Bentham
2 Tyldesley Band Brian Peacock
3 Walkden Band E. Vint
Withdrawn Edge Hill Mervin Hughes
